remarks: Cartesian product dominates successor for set with cardinality greater than 1.  Proposition 10.38 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 93 (but generalized to arbitrary sets, not just ordinals).  (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2015.)
statement: sucxpdom $p |- ( 1o ~< A -> suc A ~<_ ( A X. A ) ) $.
